Name: Why War?
About the game: Why War? is a 2D shooter adventure game about two soldiers from different sides who don't understand why they are fighting each other, so instead they break all the rules and team up to stop the war. You are trying to destroy the leaders in both sides and prove that war isn't the solution to any problem. One of the most dangerous friendships you could see. Features - Lots of interesting and fun levels to finish with a friend. - Your objective will be infiltrating an area or a camp, stealing or destroying plans to find the leaders. - Events and choices throughout the game levels to determine people's opinion of both of you. - Use the advantages of being on both sides to enter restricted areas and blend in groups. - Plan your attacks using the advantages of being on both armies. - Multiple different ending to choose from at the end of the game. - Mind challenging fun levels and a dangerous bold adventure! - Re-playable with different choices and endings. - More levels in future updates. - Coming to Macs in future updates. Will you be able stop the war and restore peace? You don't restore peace everyday so time to find out!
